exercises.title: Scheduling Template
exercises.template:
Hi {name},

Can we move our {meeting_type} to {day} at {time}? If that doesn’t work, I’m free {alt_day} {alt_window}.

{closing}
—

exercises.title: Update Template
exercises.template:
Hi {name},

Quick update on {project}: I’ve finished a first pass and added comments around the {topic}. I can walk you through it on {day}.

{closing}
—
